tranlsationEN.welcome: Get Your Favorite Meals Delivered ‚Äì Fast, Fresh, Easy.
tranlsationEN.heroQuote: Order from top restaurants around you with just a few clicks.
tranlsationEN.searchPlaceholder: Search for dishes, cuisines, or restaurants...
tranlsationEN.deliveryDesc: Get your favorite meals delivered to your doorstep in 30 minutes or less.
tranlsationEN.priceDesc: Enjoy great food at budget-friendly prices with regular discounts and offers.
tranlsationEN.interfaceDesc: Intuitive design that makes ordering food simple and enjoyable for everyone.
tranlsationEN.menuDesc: Explore a wide variety of restaurants and dishes available in your area.
tranlsationEN.shoppingDesc: Select your favorite items, customize them, and proceed to checkout.
tranlsationEN.enjoyDesc: Sit back and relax while we deliver your delicious meal to your door.
tranlsationEN.goal: Eat Ease is a food delivery web app built for convenience and speed. Developed using Java Spring Boot (backend) and React +TypeScript (frontend), it helps users order from local restaurants effortlessly.
tranlsationEN.aim: Our platform connects hungry customers with their favorite local restaurants, making food ordering simple, fast, and enjoyable for busy students and families.
tranlsationEN.myDesc: This project represents the culmination of years of learning in software development, combining modern web technologies to solve real-world problems.
tranlsationEN.footerDesc: Making food delivery simple, fast, and affordable for everyone.
tranlsationEN.homeDesc: Discover delicious meals from your favorite restaurants
tranlsationEN.noPreviousMessage: No previous orders found. Start ordering to see your favorites here!
tranlsationEN.restaurantsQuote: Discover amazing dining experiences near you
tranlsationEN.searchRestaurants: Try adjusting your search or filters to find more options
